## `ExportScores` {#standard-exportscores}

Saves the project's test scores to *outputFilePath*.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
ExportScores(string outputFilePath)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
`string` outputFilePath | The file to save the scores.
